website_summaries.verdict: A premium boat cover for hard top and T-top boats.
pros: Includes a heavy-duty shock cord hem that ensures the cover fits most boats
Straps and buckles keep cover secure
cons: More expensive than comparable boat covers

customer_reviews.title: Price Worthy
customer_reviews.text: Recently received the cover for my 26' Carolina Skiff Ultra Elite center console. The cover is big enough and then some. I'm very pleased with the quality and ease of use. I do recommend a good weather protecting spray to help repel water. The cover does a "good" job repelling water but the seams do allow leakage without the help of a seam sealer or water repellent spray. I recommend Star Brite waterproofing. I recommend and would purchase this cover again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow Wow Sea fox 236 Wa Hardtop 24-26 feet cover  Gray
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome out the bag Had a front written on cover to guide All the Black stripes go across It took my bro and me 10 minutes on first try Covered my Yamaha F200 engine also Straps are great i mean great someone planned this right As far as durability i don't know as yet but the material felt PERFECT it had a carry cover for it when i go Tuna fishing and i plan to store it in it Haah Really for 400 bucks a great protection for the boat Gray looks whitish real cool Will update i live in Bay area California so no snow etc Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: The Best Boat Cover
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other covers I've had this one beats them. I'm covering a 25' center console and the quality is noticeable. I particularly like the reinforcing straps that go around. The tie downs are very good and the price was cheaper than the others so that was a pleasant surprise. This one even comes with vents (very important) at no extra cost. The material is a little heavier (600) which I like. I have been averaging 1-1.1/2 years with the previous ones in the south Florida sun.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cover
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cover! I got it a little bigger knowing I was going over the wake tower and went a little to big in my estimate but even large the cover is great! Already been through one hurricane and several thunderstorms. Good quality product I'll definitely buy again (but a bit smaller sized).
customer_reviews.author: Tim Troyer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price would recommend to anyone .
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, I have a radar tower on my boat , purchased a size bigger than needed works fantastic. Looks good , easy to deploy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard O

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: BIIIG Cover and it works well. This is my second one of these covers. I have mine on a 25' Center console boat with a tall casting platform mounted on the console. Beam of my boat is 108" with low sides and it fits it perfectly. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Burford

customer_reviews.title: Good cover!
customer_reviews.text: All around pretty good cover for a great price. Bought this after a shipper ripped our OEM cover for our Mastercraft x24 and it works well. I’m pleased with it to the point I may stick with this cover which was intended as a temporary solution. Only downside is it doesn’t look amazing, but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cover for Wakeboard Boat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2008 Malibu wakesetter 247. This covers from the front of the boat where my trailer crank is at, all the way back OVER the tower and then also covers the swim deck. Fits very nicely and the ties to tie it down snug it up perfectly. Also covers pretty much the entire boat. We live in Vegas and the goal is to get as much of the boat out of the sun during the summer as possible. This works great! Since it’s brand new and I just installed I can’t say about durability and how it will hold up in the hot sun.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee D.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat this cover for $400 it’s well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat this cover for $400 it’s well worth the money. I now have 1.5 years on this cover which has been subjected to North East winter weather and extreme winds. Only now has it torn. No other cover I have owned has lasted this long under these conditions!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value.
customer_reviews.text: This cover fit perfectly for boats up to 26ft length, the quality is good, it is easy to install and remove and the most important thing is that the price is reasonable compare with other EXPENSIVE options. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Victor LaSalvia

customer_reviews.title: Great boat cover!
customer_reviews.text: Great boat cover! Good material and straps. Lots of tie down straps! Comes in a storage bag. Would buy again. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Was going to order a custom cover but decided to try this first. Very pleased with the fit and quality. the is size is very flexible and would fit many different boats a great value and product
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D. Weidner

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to cover a 25ft bay boat with a T-top and it works perfectly, even covers the engine, powerpoles and the trailer belts.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: instruction sheet in package states to add scotch-guard if cover ...
customer_reviews.text: instruction sheet in package states to add scotch-guard if cover lets water through. I returned the cover.Seems were singled stiched...
customer_reviews.author: Eva G. Fazekas

customer_reviews.title: There is an best
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and nice for hook up it cool thing perfect for me thanks this best so far
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 24 ft Caravelle walk-around like a glove.
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made, I will update on the durability later. But it fit my 24 ft walk around with a top like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Attyjeff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit to Our Parker
customer_reviews.text: We Have a 22 footer Parker and it fit perfectly. The Price was just right. Material is nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rosij28

customer_reviews.title: Fits 23’ searay laguna center console with T top and pulpit
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: 23JUL20 it has shredded to pieces. For whom it may concern: I had a hard time finding a cover to fit my 23’ boat with 1’ pulpit custom t top and bow rails. This cover fit over the entire boat and motor and the straps were plenty long enough to go underneath the trailer to the other side. So far very satisfied, time will tell durability.
customer_reviews.author: Kory

customer_reviews.title: Dry and clean
customer_reviews.text: Great cover. Put it on my 25 foot walk around with hard top,Fit perfect. Pretty easy to install. One person can do it, two makes it easier. My son and I can have it and buckled within 5 minutes. Well worth the money keeps the boat dry and clean
customer_reviews.author: jaywilk

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 24 ft Center Console Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lot easier to put on and off than I though. I can do it by myself but it is easier with two people. I would highly recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Rip already
customer_reviews.text: The thing already ripped, not even 5 mths old. Not worth the money. Now our boat is exposed to mold, since the rain water was dripping into the rip. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Kat C

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: Well made boat cover, fit my Sea Ray perfectly, great value. We will see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO IT!
customer_reviews.text: 239fs with windlass motor and fits like a glove!!! Great great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.author: Nytraine

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: This fit really well on my 25 foot. It looks solid and secure. It will be outside this winter in the upper peninsula of Michigan. We'll see how it looks in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL C. MALONEY

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: On a 22 ft Sea Hunt almost 23. Hard t top seems to be well made and as fate would have it in Florida had a bad storm about 3 hours after I put it on and it’s fine no puddled water. Hope it lasts I’ll update
customer_reviews.author: joe cox

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and fits taller boats. Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Fits Pursuit WA 2470 with Bimini top up. Excellent coverage, water proofing. Hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: M. Bracken

customer_reviews.title: The cover was fine very light weight easy to put
customer_reviews.text: The cover was fine very light weight easy to put. The straps to hold it on were a little to light weight a few of the straps tore at the stiches putting it on for the first time, I don't know how long they will hold but I will make dew and re stich them with stronger material they can be beefed up.
customer_reviews.author: JON GAGNON

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this cover. Fits our 25’ cat like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Good for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a great cover for the 1st 2.5 years. I live in Washington state and the exposure is mild. The fabric started getting thin and tearing in the wind. I would have sent it back for warranty but threw it away before I realized it had a warranty past the 1st year. Would have like to see if they would honored the 7 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Lasts and strong
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and weather proof. Easy too put on a boat and fits multiple size boats.
customer_reviews.author: Tara McGregor

customer_reviews.title: No response from seller
customer_reviews.text: This item came with a defect and I sent pictures showing it and they never returned a response for repair or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly reccomended.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for New England weather. Fit my boat like a glove. Easy to install with a little help.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Collins

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Way better than expected. Good value for the money. We have a 24 ft boat and bought the biggest one and it is well covered!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Erickson

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: I love it very easy to install nice elastic around the bottom for a nice fit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Product is great it just a little small for my boat wished they had a bigger one but it is a very nice cover.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mountjoy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i thought it would be easy to install and so far holding up with the weather.
customer_reviews.author: David Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and Gets the job done. I thought the purchase is more like an invesment when comparing to seasonal wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: ERAY

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install...using a boat pole installed on my 25’ T-top in 15 minutes by myself Good value - recommend
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 25 ft from bow over radar arch, to swim step. Great setup
customer_reviews.author: William Arquette

customer_reviews.title: It was bigger than I thought and it could use ...
customer_reviews.text: It was bigger than I thought and it could use a few more tie downs, otherwise it fits my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Latches broke
customer_reviews.text: Latches on cover broke off on first use. What is warranty?
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P Leon

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Work perfect on a 23 foot pro line. The boat measures more like 25 to 26
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit nice on my parker 2310 with pulpit but without the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit nice on my parker 2310 with pulpit but without the hardtop But has room if I did have one
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: was not sure if it fit but it turn out to be perfect fit. For the price Definitely would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Got one for my 2002 Bayliner Trophy 26 footer hardtop, was not sure if it fit but it turn out to be perfect fit. For the price Definitely would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Budge 600 Denier Boat Cover fits Hard Top/T-Top Boats B-621-X8 (24' to 26' Long, Gray)
product_meta.description:
Size:24'-26' Long (Beam Width Up to 106")| Color:GrayThe Budge Sportsman 600 Denier Boat Covers, B-621-X8 provides all weather protection for your Hard Top / T-Top Boat. Guaranteed to provide superior protection to your boat, this cover provides ultimate marine grade protection. 

Waterproof to repel snow, hot sun and heavy rain, the 600 denier polyester material is UV treated for maximum sun and heat protection to protect your boat's upholstery and paint. A heavy duty shock cord hem gives the cover a semi-custom fit and sewn-in straps and buckles make it exceptionally durable when trailering, so you can safely tow your boat to the shore. 

This boat cover fits hard top / t-top boats 24'-26' (288"-312") Long, beam width up to 106".
feature_bullets: MARINE GRADE PROTECTION: Waterproof to repel snow, hot sun and heavy rain, the 600 denier polyester material is UV treated for maximum sun and heat protection to protect your boat's upholstery and paint
WATERPROOF AND BREATHABLE: Material designed to prevent condensation build-up and reduce rust, mold and mildew
BUILT TO STAY SECURE: Heavy shock cord hem gives cover a semi-custom fit. Sewn-in straps make it exceptionally durable when trailering, so you can tow your boat to the shore without having to worry

SIZED TO FIT: Our custom-like design Budge 600 Denier Boat Cover fits Hard Top / T-Top Boats. This boat cover fits hard top / t-top boats 24'-26'. The dimensions of the cover are 312 in. L x 224 in. W.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars104 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
